      • ProfileScreen

        public ProfileScreen()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This is the main method of this class, used to display the various text views, buttons, and spinners displayed on the screen. It also calls the necessary methods to pull info from the server and update info on the server. In this method, user clicks are also monitored.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - contains info for this activity if the activity was previously started, may be null
        See Also:
        getInfo(), updateServer(Hashtable)

      • getInfo

        private void getInfo()
        Pulls a JSONArray from the database to find the current user's info. Using the findUser method, this method finds the current user and then updates the text views on the screen with the update_text method.

      • heightConv

        private void heightConv(int h,
                        int[] h_arr,
                        boolean convert)
        Simple helper method to convert the height measurement from inches to feet and inches
        Parameters:
        h - height in inches
        h_arr - array used to store height
        convert - boolean to indicate which way to convert

      • findUser

        private org.json.JSONObject findUser(org.json.JSONArray response)
                              throws org.json.JSONException
        This method searches through the JSONArray received in the getInfo method to find a specific user. The method iterates through the JSONArray to find a user based on the user name stored upon login.
        Parameters:
        response - A JSONArray containing the users listed in the database
        Returns:
        returns a JSONObject of the current user
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - this exception is thrown if the user is not found in the JSONArray

      • update_text

        private void update_text()
        Updates the text views on the screen to show the current User's info pulled from the server.

      • checkForChanges

        private boolean checkForChanges()
        This method is used to scan for changes a user may have made on the profile screen. It stores the values in a Hashtable which is used in the updateServer method. This method also checks to make sure that all text fields contain some value.
        Returns:
        returns true if any changes were found, false if otherwise or if any errors exist

      • updateServer

        private boolean updateServer(Hashtable<String,Boolean> c)
        This method is used to change a user's info stored in the server database. The method only updates the fields that have been marked as changed in the checkForChanges method.
        Parameters:
        c - a Hashtable used to store info on if the fields on the screen have been changed
        Returns:
        returns true if updates were successfully made to the server
